skill.name: planning-with-trello
skill.description: Manages feature planning workflow including budget validation, task creation, and Trello synchronization.
skill.summary: Manages feature planning workflow including budget validation, task creation, and Trello synchroniza...
skill.author: BPSAI

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing no executable code. This is a markdown-based prompt guide for planning workflows. All functionality is handled by the external bpsai-pair CLI tool. No network calls, file system access, or code execution paths exist within this skill definition.

content.value_statement: Managing feature planning without structured workflows leads to scope creep and budget overruns. This skill provides a systematic approach to planning features with built-in budget validation, task breakdown, and Trello synchronization.
actual_capabilities: Validate daily token budget before planning
Break features into 3-8 tasks with complexity estimates
Create task files with objectives and acceptance criteria
Sync plans to Trello boards with custom fields
Estimate token usage for task execution
limitations: Requires bpsai-pair CLI tool for actual execution
Trello sync depends on configured API credentials
Cannot create plans without backlog or feature description
Budget validation requires configured API access

use_cases.title: Plan Sprint Work
use_cases.description: Break down sprint goals into actionable tasks with complexity scoring and budget estimates.

use_cases.title: Sync to Trello Boards
use_cases.description: Create standardized cards with custom fields and effort sizing for team visibility.

use_cases.title: Estimate Project Scope
use_cases.description: Define feature scope with clear tasks and acceptance criteria before development begins.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan a new feature based on this description: [description]. Use the planning-with-trello workflow.

prompt_templates.title: Sprint Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a sprint plan from backlog-sprint-[n].md. Include budget validation and Trello sync.

prompt_templates.title: Task Estimation
prompt_templates.prompt: Break down this feature into tasks with complexity scores: [feature description]. Each task should have clear acceptance criteria.

prompt_templates.title: Full Workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the complete planning workflow: gather context, design plan, break into tasks, validate budget, create plan files, sync to Trello, and update state.

output_examples.input: Plan a webhook integration feature for our API
output: Token Budget: ~45K tokens (12% of daily limit)
First Task: T28.1 - Design webhook API endpoints

best_practices: Always run budget status check before starting new plans to avoid mid-work interruptions.
Keep task files focused with 3-8 tasks per plan for manageable complexity.
Use consistent effort sizing (S/M/L) across all tasks for reliable sprint planning.
anti_patterns: Creating epics with more than 100 complexity without splitting into smaller plans.
Skipping budget validation when daily usage exceeds 80 percent.
Creating tasks without clear acceptance criteria or verification steps.

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude Code and Claude. Requires bpsai-pair CLI for execution and Trello API access for sync.

faq.question: How many tasks should each plan contain?
faq.answer: Plans should contain 3-8 tasks. More than 8 indicates the plan should be split into smaller pieces.

faq.question: Can I use this without Trello?
faq.answer: Yes. The planning workflow works fully without Trello sync. Skip sync commands to use locally only.

faq.question: Is my planning data stored securely?
faq.answer: Task files are stored locally in your project. Trello data is stored on Trello's servers according to their privacy policy.

faq.question: What if budget check fails?
faq.answer: Reduce scope, split into multiple plans, or get explicit user approval before proceeding with planning.

faq.question: How does this compare to other planning tools?
faq.answer: Unlike generic project management, this skill integrates budget validation and AI-specific task patterns for LLM-based development.
